results.name: a(n) = 4^n mod n.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b066602.txt", n, " ", 4^n % n) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Mar 09 2010

ext: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_ and _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 23 2001
